item.title: Getting started
item.description: Programming the Clawbot This tutorial is a step-by-step guide to programming this simple skills robot: This robot has motors and sensors plugged into the following ports: Motor Port Description Motor Port Description 1 6 Right middle motor 2 Left front motor 7 Right bottom motor 3 Left middle motor 8 4 Left bottom motor 9 5 Right top motor 10 Digital Port Description Digital Port Description 1 Left encoder top wire 7 2 Left encoder bottom wire 8 3 Right encoder top wire 9 4 Right encoder bottom wire 10 5 11 6 12 Analog Port Description Analog Port Description 1 Lift potentiometer 5 2 6 3 7 4 8 Project Configuration After installing OkapiLib through the PROS Conductor tool, okapilib.
